I am now eligible to vote in a state where it doesn’t really make a difference if I do or not.
The building I work in is not prepared for this cool weather. Its freezing at my desk.
Marvin has a new friend! (Yes, I know I need to clean my desk.)
FINALLY got the new Twitter. I guess they didn’t roll out by time since you joined or I would have gotten in a long time ago. Like it so far

Apparently I’m wearing a lot of orange lately.

Well, today officially sucks.
I would like for this weekend to not end.

Easy A with @candace_leigh!
My foot won’t stop tapping in anticipation for my long weekend with @candace_leigh.
I think my house is officially ready for my housewarming party this weekend.
@candace_leigh I cannot wait to see you! Good luck on your exams :-)
Just realized my website is broken. I wonder how many visitors I missed because of it being down. 100? 200? Probably 5.
Luckily that is only my back up disk that is having the problem. Note to all: BACK UP YOUR FILES!!!
Uh oh. Disk Utility can’t repair this disk. Back up as many of your files as possible, reformat the disk, and restore your backed-up files.

Raquel had a bad day.

I wish Dropbox had a 25GB option. I would so get that.

@candace_leigh yay for not getting sick!

@pennypascal Just do what I do and throw it all in random little boxes with no labels. Then you’ll be surprised when you find things later!

Bought a pack of gum in April. Lost pack of gum. Brought jacket to work today. Found pack of gum today in jacket pocket.
Hot.

I wish Apple would just release an iPhone on Verizon already. I have barely been able to make calls today.

@jh32488 that’s good to hear. It was hard to justify spending that much but hopefully it’ll be worth it.

Happy birthday, America.
“Help me, Obi Wan Kenobi. You’re my only hope.”

I need to come back here soon.
Tweet from my TV!

I just bought a Tiffany lamp from target and I am quite excited about it. I know how that makes me sound. I don’t care.
I think I’m afraid to buy the new iPhone. What with the reception issues and all. That’s the biggest complaint about my current iPhone!
